Package me.mthw.forge.ingest.analyzer

Class Analyzer

java.lang.Object
me.mthw.forge.ingest.analyzer.Analyzer
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileAnalyzerOffice, FileAnalyzerPDF, FileAnalyzerStrings, FileAnalyzerZIPArchive, FileAnalyzerZIPFile, VolumeAnalyzerBitlocker, VolumeAnalyzerLUKS
public abstract class Analyzer extends Object
Abstract class representing an Analyzer that processes files or volumes and interacts with the Blackboard to create and manage artifacts and attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Analyzer

      public Analyzer(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.BlackboardAttribute.Type mainAtttribute, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard blackboard, org.sleuthkit.autopsy.ingest.IngestJobContext context) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Constructs an Analyzer object to process and analyze data during an ingest job.
      Parameters:
      mainAtttribute - The main attribute type to be analyzed.
      blackboard - The blackboard instance used for storing artifacts and attributes.
      context - The context of the current ingest job.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If there is an error interacting with the blackboard.

  • Method Details

    • process

      public abstract boolean process(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.AbstractFile file) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException, IOException, IllegalAccessError, org.sleuthkit.autopsy.casemodule.NoCurrentCaseException
      Processes the given file and performs analysis on it.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to be processed, represented as an AbstractFile.
      Returns:
      true if the processing is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException - If there is an error with the Sleuth Kit core.
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If there is an error interacting with the blackboard.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during processing.
      IllegalAccessError - If there is an illegal access error during processing.
      org.sleuthkit.autopsy.casemodule.NoCurrentCaseException - If there is no current case available for processing.

    • process

      public abstract boolean process(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Volume volume) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException, IOException, IllegalAccessError, org.sleuthkit.autopsy.casemodule.NoCurrentCaseException
      Processes the given volume and performs analysis on it.
      Parameters:
      volume - The volume to be processed.
      Returns:
      true if the processing is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException - If an error occurs in the Sleuth Kit core.
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If an error occurs while posting to the blackboard.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during processing.
      IllegalAccessError - If the method is accessed in an illegal context.
      org.sleuthkit.autopsy.casemodule.NoCurrentCaseException - If there is no current case available for processing.

    • createArtifact

      protected abstract void createArtifact() throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Creates an artifact as part of the analysis process. This method is abstract and must be implemented by subclasses to define the specific name for the artifact. The subclass should call createArtifact(String typeName, String displayName, BlackboardArtifact.Category category)
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - if an error occurs during artifact creation.

    • createAttributes

      protected abstract void createAttributes()
      Abstract method to create and fill attributesMap for the analyzer. Subclasses must provide an implementation for this method to define the specific attributes required for their analysis process.

    • addAttributesToBlackBoard

      protected void addAttributesToBlackBoard() throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Adds attributes from the attributes map to the blackboard. For each attribute in the map, it retrieves or creates the corresponding attribute type in the blackboard and assigns it to the attribute. Map is filled by each subclass in the createAttributes() method.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - if an error occurs while interacting with the blackboard.

    • addArtifact

      protected void addArtifact(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Content file, List<org.sleuthkit.datamodel.BlackboardAttribute> attributes, String conclusion, String justification) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Adds an artifact to the blackboard with the specified attributes, conclusion, and justification. This method uses a default score of SCORE_LIKELY_NOTABLE and does not include a configuration string.
      Parameters:
      file - The content file associated with the artifact.
      attributes - A list of blackboard attributes to associate with the artifact.
      conclusion - A conclusion or summary about the artifact.
      justification - A justification or explanation for the conclusion.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException - If there is an error adding the artifact to the blackboard.
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If there is an error interacting with the blackboard.

    • addArtifact

      protected void addArtifact(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Content file, List<org.sleuthkit.datamodel.BlackboardAttribute> attributes, String conclusion, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Score score) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Adds an artifact to the blackboard with the specified attributes, conclusion, and score and does not include a configuration and justification string.
      Parameters:
      file - The content file to associate with the artifact.
      attributes - A list of blackboard attributes to include in the artifact.
      conclusion - A conclusion or summary about the artifact.
      score - The score or priority level associated with the artifact.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException - If there is an error adding the artifact to the blackboard.
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If there is an error interacting with the blackboard.

    • addArtifact

      protected void addArtifact(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Content file, List<org.sleuthkit.datamodel.BlackboardAttribute> attributes, String conclusion) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Adds an artifact to the blackboard with the specified attributes and conclusion. This method uses a default score of SCORE_LIKELY_NOTABLE and does not include a configuration and justification string.
      Parameters:
      file - The content file associated with the artifact.
      attributes - A list of blackboard attributes to associate with the artifact.
      conclusion - A conclusion or description for the artifact.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException - If there is an error adding the artifact to the blackboard.
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If there is an error posting the artifact to the blackboard.

    • addArtifact

      protected void addArtifact(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Content file, List<org.sleuthkit.datamodel.BlackboardAttribute> attributes, String conclusion, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Score score, String configuration, String justification) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Adds an analysis result artifact to the specified content file, removing any existing analysis results of the same type beforehand.
      Parameters:
      file - The content file to which the artifact will be added.
      attributes - A list of attributes to associate with the artifact.
      conclusion - A conclusion string describing the analysis result.
      score - The score representing the significance of the analysis result.
      configuration - The configuration string associated with the analysis.
      justification - The justification string explaining the analysis result.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException - If an error occurs while interacting with the Sleuth Kit database.
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If an error occurs while posting the artifact to the blackboard.

    • getAttributeType

      public org.sleuthkit.datamodel.BlackboardAttribute.Type getAttributeType(String typeName)
      Retrieves the BlackboardAttribute.Type associated with the specified type name.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The name of the type for which the attribute type is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The BlackboardAttribute.Type corresponding to the given type name, or null if the type name is not found in the attributes map.

    • createArtifact

      protected void createArtifact(String typeName, String displayName) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Creates an artifact with the specified type name, display name, and assigns it to the default category of analysis results.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The type name of the artifact to be created.
      displayName - The display name of the artifact to be created.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If an error occurs while creating the artifact.

    • createArtifact

      protected void createArtifact(String typeName, String displayName, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.BlackboardArtifact.Category category) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Creates or retrieves a blackboard artifact type with the specified type name, display name, and category. If the artifact type does not already exist, it will be added to the blackboard.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The unique name of the artifact type.
      displayName - The human-readable name of the artifact type.
      category - The category of the artifact type.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If there is an error creating or retrieving the artifact type.
